price: Nuti kaafirootaaf sansalata, sakaallaawwaniifi ibidda boba'aa qopheessinee jirra.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
